entry.title: Drugs Used for Neuromuscular Blockade in General Anesthesia
entry.content:
The 2 major classes of drugs are depolarizing versus non-depolarizing.

Succinylcholine is the protypical drug of the depolarizing class and rocuronium is a popular choice in the non-depolarizing group.

entry.title: Indications for Urgent Dialysis
entry.content: Some reasons for urgent dialyis may include a) b) c). But, remember that E) and D) should be considered as well.
